r.s: PHP documentation rendering package for PhD
r.d: A package for PhD to render the php.net (phpdoc) documentation
r.n: - Render return type in PHP 7 style (PHP package) (Peter) - Add support for <type>iterable</type> (Jiří Pudil) - Fixes for rendering PhD's guide as PHP/HowTo (Maciej) - Better handling for deprecated functions (Maciej) - Link to the array|object docs (Hannes) - Fixed breadcrumbs HTML markup (PHP: chunked xhtml) (Maciej) - Fixed bug#66408 (Wrong style file in chm documentation) (Andy Burton)
